title: Mana Shim Will Lead US Soccer Task Force on Abuse Reforms
description: Mana Shim’s revelations of sexual abuse by her coach helped drive a reckoning in women’s soccer. Her new job at U.S. Soccer should position her to direct change from inside the federation.
dc:creator: Andrew Das
media:credit: Cal Sport Media, via Associated Press
media:description: Mana Shim will join U.S. Soccer as the chair of what the federation is calling its participant safety task force.
